assigningCategoryMarkerStyle.description:
Event fired to allow you to override the style of markers for the items in a category or financial series. Only fires if you set allowCustomCategoryMarkerStyle to true for a series.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.series to get reference to current series object.
   Use ui.startIndex to get the start index for the current items.
   Use ui.endIndex to get the end index for the current items.
   Use ui.hasDateRange to tell if you should use the startDate and endDate to know the current items instead of startIndex/endIndex.
   Use ui.startDate if ui.hasDateRange is true.
   Use ui.endDate if ui.hasDateRange is true.
   Use ui.getItems to get all the items associated with the event (only if necessary).
   Use ui.fill to get or set the fill to use for the current item.
   Use ui.stroke to get or set the stroke to use for the current item.
   Use ui.opacity to get or set the opacity to use for the current item.
   Use ui.highlightingHandled to set if the default highlighting behavior should not run, given that you are handling it in this event.
   Use ui.maxAllSeriesHighlightingProgress to get the maximum highlighted progress across all series.
   Use ui.sumAllSeriesHighlightingProgress to get the sum of highlighting progtess across all series.
   Use ui.highlightingInfo.progress to tell what the highlighting progress is for the current item, if highlightingInfo is not null.
   Use ui.highlightingInfo.state to tell whether the current item is currently highlighting in or out, is static, if highlightingInfo is not null.

assigningCategoryStyle.description:
Event fired to allow you to override the style of items in a category or financial series. Only fires if you set allowCustomCategoryStyle to true for a series.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.series to get reference to current series object.
   Use ui.startIndex to get the start index for the current items.
   Use ui.endIndex to get the end index for the current items.
   Use ui.hasDateRange to tell if you should use the startDate and endDate to know the current items instead of startIndex/endIndex.
   Use ui.startDate if ui.hasDateRange is true.
   Use ui.endDate if ui.hasDateRange is true.
   Use ui.getItems to get all the items associated with the event (only if necessary).
   Use ui.fill to get or set the fill to use for the current item.
   Use ui.stroke to get or set the stroke to use for the current item.
   Use ui.opacity to get or set the opacity to use for the current item.
   Use ui.highlightingHandled to set if the default highlighting behavior should not run, given that you are handling it in this event.
   Use ui.maxAllSeriesHighlightingProgress to get the maximum highlighted progress across all series.
   Use ui.sumAllSeriesHighlightingProgress to get the sum of highlighting progtess across all series.
   Use ui.highlightingInfo.progress to tell what the highlighting progress is for the current item, if highlightingInfo is not null.
   Use ui.highlightingInfo.state to tell whether the current item is currently highlighting in or out, is static, if highlightingInfo is not null.

axisRangeChanged.description:
Event fired when the range of and axis on the chart changes.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.axis to get reference to current chart axis object.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.newMaximumValue to get new maximum value.
   Use ui.newMinimumValue to get new minimum value.
   Use ui.oldMaximumValue to get old maximum value.
   Use ui.oldMinimumValue to get old minimum value.

browserNotSupported.description: event fired when the control is displayed on a non HTML5 compliant browser

gridAreaRectChanged.description:
Occurs just after the current Chart's grid area rectangle is changed.
   The grid area may change as the result of the Chart being resized, or
   of an axis being added or changing size, possibly in another Chart.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.newHeight to get new height value.
   Use ui.newLeft to get new left value.
   Use ui.newTop to get new top value.
   Use ui.newWidth to get new top value.
   Use ui.oldHeight to get old height value.
   Use ui.oldLeft to get old left value.
   Use ui.oldTop to get old top value.
   Use ui.oldWidth to get old top value.

progressiveLoadStatusChanged.description:
Event fired when the progressive loading state of the series has changed.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.series to get reference to current series object.
   Use ui.currentStatus to get current status.

refreshCompleted.description:
Raised when the chart's processing for an update has completed.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.

seriesCursorMouseMove.description:
Occurs when the cursors are moved over a series in this chart.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.item to get reference to current series item object.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.series to get reference to current series object.
   Use ui.actualItemBrush to get item brush.
   Use ui.actualSeriesBrush to get series brush.
   Use ui.positionX to get mouse X position.
   Use ui.positionY to get mouse Y position.

seriesMouseEnter.description:
Occurs when the left mouse pointer enters an element of this chart.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.item to get reference to current series item object.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.series to get reference to current series object.
   Use ui.actualItemBrush to get item brush.
   Use ui.actualSeriesBrush to get series brush.
   Use ui.positionX to get mouse X position.
   Use ui.positionY to get mouse Y position.

seriesMouseLeave.description:
Occurs when the left mouse pointer leaves an element of this chart.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.item to get reference to current series item object.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.series to get reference to current series object.
   Use ui.actualItemBrush to get item brush.
   Use ui.actualSeriesBrush to get series brush.
   Use ui.positionX to get mouse X position.
   Use ui.positionY to get mouse Y position.

seriesMouseLeftButtonDown.description:
Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over an element of this chart.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.item to get reference to current series item object.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.series to get reference to current series object.
   Use ui.actualItemBrush to get item brush.
   Use ui.actualSeriesBrush to get series brush.
   Use ui.positionX to get mouse X position.
   Use ui.positionY to get mouse Y position.

seriesMouseLeftButtonUp.description:
Occurs when the left mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over an element of this chart.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.item to get reference to current series item object.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.series to get reference to current series object.
   Use ui.actualItemBrush to get item brush.
   Use ui.actualSeriesBrush to get series brush.
   Use ui.positionX to get mouse X position.
   Use ui.positionY to get mouse Y position.

seriesMouseMove.description:
Occurs when the left mouse pointer moves while over an element of this chart.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.item to get reference to current series item object.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.series to get reference to current series object.
   Use ui.actualItemBrush to get item brush.
   Use ui.actualSeriesBrush to get series brush.
   Use ui.positionX to get mouse X position.
   Use ui.positionY to get mouse Y position.

tooltipHidden.description:
event fired after a tooltip is hidden
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.element to get reference to tooltip DOM element.
   Use ui.item to get reference to current series item object.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.series to get reference to current series object.
   Use ui.actualItemBrush to get item brush.
   Use ui.actualSeriesBrush to get series brush.

tooltipHiding.description:
event fired when the mouse has left a series and the tooltip is about to hide
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.element to get reference to tooltip DOM element.
   Use ui.item to get reference to current series item object.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.series to get reference to current series object.
   Use ui.actualItemBrush to get item brush.
   Use ui.actualSeriesBrush to get series brush.

tooltipShowing.description:
event fired when the mouse has hovered on a series and the tooltip is about to show
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.element to get reference to tooltip DOM element.
   Use ui.item to get reference to current series item object.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.series to get reference to current series object.
   Use ui.actualItemBrush to get item brush.
   Use ui.actualSeriesBrush to get series brush.

tooltipShown.description:
event fired after a tooltip is shown
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.element to get reference to tooltip DOM element.
   Use ui.item to get reference to current series item object.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.series to get reference to current series object.
   Use ui.actualItemBrush to get item brush.
   Use ui.actualSeriesBrush to get series brush.

typicalBasedOn.description:
Handle this event in order to specify which columns the Typical price calculation is based on.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.series to get reference to current series object.
   Use ui.count to get the number of positions that should be calculated from the start.
   Use ui.position to get the beginning position that should be calculated from.
   Use ui.supportingCalculations to get the supporting calculations to use in the calculation.
   Use ui.dataSource to get the data to use for the calculation.
   Use ui.basedOn to specify which columns changing will invalidate the series and cause it to be recalculated.

windowRectChanged.description:
Occurs just after the current Chart's window rectangle is changed.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.newHeight to get new height value.
   Use ui.newLeft to get new left value.
   Use ui.newTop to get new top value.
   Use ui.newWidth to get new top value.
   Use ui.oldHeight to get old height value.
   Use ui.oldLeft to get old left value.
   Use ui.oldTop to get old top value.
   Use ui.oldWidth to get old top value.

animateSeriesWhenAxisRangeChanges.description: Set to true in order to override the default behavior in which series do not animate if an axis range changes

autoMarginHeight.description: Sets or gets the automatic height to add when automatically adding margins to the chart.

autoMarginWidth.description: Sets or gets the automatic width to add when automatically adding margins to the chart.

valueOptions.name: numericX
valueOptions.description: Specify the axis as numeric X axis. Useful for displaying scatter, category and financial price series.

valueOptions.name: numericY
valueOptions.description: Specify the axis as numeric Y axis.Useful for displaying scatter, category and financial price series.

valueOptions.name: categoryX
valueOptions.description: Specify the axis as category X axis. Useful for displaying scatter, category and financial price series.

valueOptions.name: categoryDateTimeX
valueOptions.description: Specify the axis as category datetime X axis. Useful for displaying category and financial price series with date based data.

valueOptions.name: categoryY
valueOptions.description: Specify the axis as category Y axis. Useful for displaying scatter, category and financial price series.

valueOptions.name: categoryAngle
valueOptions.description: Specify the axis as category angle axis. Useful for displaying polar and radial categories.

valueOptions.name: numericAngle
valueOptions.description: Specify the axis as numeric angle axis. Useful for displaying polar and radial series.

valueOptions.name: numericRadius
valueOptions.description: Specify the axis as numeric radius axis. Useful for displaying polar and radial series.

name.description: The unique identifier of the axis.

dataSource.description: Can be any valid data source accepted by $.ig.DataSource, or an instance of an $.ig.DataSource itself.

dataSourceUrl.description: Specifies a remote URL accepted by $.ig.DataSource in order to request data from it.

dataSourceType.description: Explicitly set data source type (such as "json"). Please refer to the documentation of $.ig.DataSource and its type property.

responseDataKey.description: Specifies the name of the property in which data records are held if the response is wrapped.

remove.description: Set to true in order to have an existing axis removed from the chart, by name

labelLocation.description: Specifies the location to display the axis labels for this axis.

valueOptions.name: outsideTop
valueOptions.description: The labels should have an outside top position.

valueOptions.name: outsideBottom
valueOptions.description: The labels should have an outside bottom position.

valueOptions.name: outsideLeft
valueOptions.description: The labels should have an outside left position.

valueOptions.name: outsideRight
valueOptions.description: The labels should have an outside right position.

valueOptions.name: insideTop
valueOptions.description: The labels should have an inside top position.

valueOptions.name: insideBottom
valueOptions.description: The labels should have an inside bottom position.

valueOptions.name: insideLeft
valueOptions.description: The labels should have an inside left position.

valueOptions.name: insideRight
valueOptions.description: The labels should have an inside right position.

labelVisibility.description: Specifies whether the labels are visible.

valueOptions.name: visible
valueOptions.description: The labels should be visisble for this axis.

valueOptions.name: collapsed
valueOptions.description: The labels should not be visible for this axis.

labelExtent.description: Specifies the extent of the area dedicated to the labels for this axis. If unspecified, this value is auto-calculated.

labelAngle.description: Specifies the angle that labels on the axis should be rotated.

labelTextStyle.description: Overrides the style of the text used for the axis labels.

labelTextColor.description: Overrides the color of the text used for the axis labels.

formatLabel.description: Sets or gets a function which takes an object that produces a formatted label for displaying in the chart.

stroke.description: Gets or sets the Stroke property.

strokeThickness.description: Gets or sets the StrokeThickness property.

strip.description: Gets or sets the Strip property.

majorStroke.description: Gets or sets the MajorStroke property.

majorStrokeThickness.description: Gets or sets the MajorStrokeThickness property.

minorStroke.description: Gets or sets the MinorStroke property.

minorStrokeThickness.description: Gets or sets the MinorStrokeThickness property.

isInverted.description: Gets or sets the IsInverted property.

crossingAxis.description: Gets or sets the CrossingAxis property.

crossingValue.description: Gets or sets the CrossingValue property.

coercionMethods.description: Gets or sets the coercion methods to use when loading data from data sources. Should be specified before setting any member paths, if being used. Setting it later will not cause data to be reimported into the chart.

label.description: Gets or sets the axis label format string.

gap.description: Gets or sets the amount of space between adjacent categories for the current axis object. The gap is silently clamped to the range [0, 1] when used.

overlap.description: Gets or sets the amount of overlap between adjacent categories for the current axis object. The overlap is silently clamped to the range [-1, 1] when used.

startAngleOffset.description: Indicates the angle in degress that the chart's 0th angle should be offset.

interval.description: Gets or sets the frequency of displayed labels. The set value is a factor that determines which labels will be hidden. For example, an interval of 2 will display every other label.

displayType.description: Gets or sets the axis display type. Continuous display type divides the axis into even intervals, where labels will not necessarily be aligned with data points. Discrete display type will not use a constant interval, but will align each label with its data point.

valueOptions.name: continuous
valueOptions.description: Points occur at even intervals, even where data is not present at a given point.

valueOptions.name: discrete
valueOptions.description: Points occur when data is present, possibly at uneven intervals.

minimumValue.description: Gets or sets the axis MinimumValue.

maximumValue.description: Gets or sets the axis MaximumValue.

dateTimeMemberPath.description: Gets or sets the DateTime mapping property for the CategoryDateTimeXAxis.

referenceValue.description: Gets or sets the ReferenceValue property.

isLogarithmic.description: Gets or sets the LogarithmBase property.

logarithmBase.description: Gets or sets the LogarithmBase property.

radiusExtentScale.description: Defines the percentage of the maximum radius extent to use as the maximum radius. Should be a value between 0.0 and 1.0.

innerRadiusExtentScale.description: Defines the percentage of the maximum radius extent to leave blank at the center of the chart. Should be a value between 0.0 and 1.0.

title.description: The title to display for the component.

titleTextStyle.description: The css font property to use for the title.

titleMargin.description: The margin to display around the title of the axis.

titleHorizontalAlignment.description: The horizontal alignment to use for the title.

valueOptions.name: top
valueOptions.description: Top aligns the title

valueOptions.name: center
valueOptions.description: Center aligns the title.

valueOptions.name: bottom
valueOptions.description: Bottom aligns the title.

titleVerticalAlignment.description: The vertical alignment to use for the title.

valueOptions.name: top
valueOptions.description: Top aligns the title

valueOptions.name: center
valueOptions.description: Center aligns the title.

valueOptions.name: bottom
valueOptions.description: Bottom aligns the title.

titlePosition.description: The position to use for the title.

valueOptions.name: auto
valueOptions.description: The title is positioned automatically.

valueOptions.name: left
valueOptions.description: The title is positioned on the left of the labels, if applicable.

valueOptions.name: right
valueOptions.description: The title is positioned on the right of the labels, if applicable.

valueOptions.name: top
valueOptions.description: The title is positioned on the top of the labels, if applicable.

valueOptions.name: bottom
valueOptions.description: The title is positioned on the bottom of the labels, if applicable.

titleTopMargin.description: The top margin to use for the title.

titleLeftMargin.description: The left margin to use for the title.

titleRightMargin.description: The right margin to use for the title.

titleBottomMargin.description: The bottom margin to use for the title.

labelHorizontalAlignment.description: The horizontal alignment to use for the labels. Only applicable to vertical axes.

valueOptions.name: left
valueOptions.description: Left aligns the labels.

valueOptions.name: center
valueOptions.description: Center aligns the labels.

valueOptions.name: right
valueOptions.description: Right aligns the labels.

labelVerticalAlignment.description: The vertical alignment to use for the labels. Only applicable to horizontal axes.

valueOptions.name: top
valueOptions.description: Top aligns the labels

valueOptions.name: center
valueOptions.description: Center aligns the labels.

valueOptions.name: bottom
valueOptions.description: Bottom aligns the labels.

labelMargin.description: The margin to use for the labels.

labelTopMargin.description: The top margin to use for the labels.

labelLeftMargin.description: The left margin to use for the labels.

labelRightMargin.description: The right margin to use for the labels.

labelBottomMargin.description: The bottom margin to use for the labels.

showFirstLabel.description: Sets whether or not to show the first label on the axis.

titleAngle.description: The angle to use for the axis title.

tickLength.description: The length of the tickmarks to display for this axis.

tickStrokeThickness.description: The stroke thickness to use for the tickmarks.

tickStroke.description: The color to use for the tickmarks.

useClusteringMode.description: Gets or sets whether the cateogory axis should use clustering display mode even if no series are present that would force clustering mode.

bottomMargin.description: Sets or gets the bottom margin to use around the chart content in the canvas.

brushes.description:
Gets or sets the Brushes property.
   The brushes property defines the palette from which automatically assigned series brushes are selected.
   The value provided should be an array of css color strings. Optionally the first element can be a string reading "RGB" or "HSV" to specify the interpolation mode of the collection.

circleMarkerTemplate.description:
Gets or sets the template to use for circle markers on the chart.
   Defines the marker template used for
   series with a marker type of circle.
   The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure.

context.description: Either a DOM element or a CanvasContext2D depending on the particular template scenario

width.description: If value is present, specifies the available width, user may set to desired width for content

height.description: Either a DOM element or a CanvasContext2D depending on the particular template scenario

isConstant.description: User should set to true if desired with and height will always be the same for this template

data.description: If present, represents the contextual data for this template

context.description: Either a DOM element or a CanvasContext2D depending on the particular template scenario

xPosition.description: If present, specifies the x position at which to render the content

yPosition.description: If present, specifies the y position at which to render the content

availableWidth.description: If present, specifies the available width in which to render the content

availableHeight.description: If present, specifies the available height in which to render the content

data.description: If present, specifies the data that is in context for this content

isHitTestRender.description: If true, indicates that this is a special render pass for hit testing, in which case the brushes from the data should be used]

crosshairPoint.description:
Gets or sets the cross hair point (in world coordinates)
   Either or both of the crosshair point's X and Y may be set to double.NaN, in which
   case the relevant crosshair line is hidden.

crosshairVisibility.description: Gets or sets the current Chart's crosshair visibility override.

valueOptions.name: visible
valueOptions.description: Crosshair should be visible.

valueOptions.name: collapsed
valueOptions.description: Crosshair should not be visible.

dataSource.description: can be any valid data source accepted by $.ig.DataSource, or an instance of an $.ig.DataSource itself

dataSourceType.description: Explicitly set data source type (such as "json"). Please refer to the documentation of $.ig.DataSource and its type property.

dataSourceUrl.description: Specifies a remote URL accepted by $.ig.DataSource in order to request data from it

defaultInteraction.description: Gets or sets the DefaultInteraction property. The default interaction state defines the chart's response to mouse events.

valueOptions.name: none
valueOptions.description: User gesture will not change the state of the chart.

valueOptions.name: dragZoom
valueOptions.description: User gesture will start a drag rectangle to zoom the chart.

valueOptions.name: dragPan
valueOptions.description: User gesture will start a pan action to move the chart's window.

diamondMarkerTemplate.description:
Gets or sets the template to use for diamond markers on the chart.
   Defines the marker template used for
   series with a marker type of diamond.
   The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate

dragModifier.description: Gets or sets the current Chart's DragModifier property.

valueOptions.name: none
valueOptions.description: No modifier key is set.

valueOptions.name: alt
valueOptions.description: The modifier is set to alt key.

valueOptions.name: control
valueOptions.description: The modifier is set to control key.

valueOptions.name: shift
valueOptions.description: The modifier is set to shift key.

gridMode.description: Gets or sets the GridMode property.

valueOptions.name: none
valueOptions.description: No chart grid.

valueOptions.name: beforeSeries
valueOptions.description: Chart grid should be rendered before or in front of the data series.

valueOptions.name: behindSeries
valueOptions.description: Chart grid should be rendered behind or in back of the data series.

height.description: The height of the chart. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).

hexagonMarkerTemplate.description:
Gets or sets the template to use for hexagon markers on the chart.
   Defines the marker template used for
   series with a marker type of hexagon.
   The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate

hexagramMarkerTemplate.description:
Gets or sets the template to use for hexagram markers on the chart.
   Defines the marker template used for
   series with a marker type of hexagram.
   The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate

highlightingTransitionDuration.description: the length, in milliseconds of the highlighting transition.

horizontalZoomable.description: Gets or sets the current Chart's horizontal zoomability.

isSquare.description: Gets or sets whether to use a square aspect ratio for the chart. This is locked to true for polar and radial charts.

isSurfaceInteractionDisabled.description: Set to true in order to disable any interactions with the plot surface.

leftMargin.description: Sets or gets the left margin to use around the chart content in the canvas.

legend.description: Can be any valid options accepted by $.ig.ChartLegend, or an instance of an $.ig.ChartLegend itself.

element.description: The name of the element to turn into a legend.

type.description: The name of the element to turn into a legend.

valueOptions.name: item
valueOptions.description: Specify the legend as item legend. It displays a legend item for each pie in the igPieChart control.

valueOptions.name: legend
valueOptions.description: Specify the legend as legend. It is supported by all types of series in the igDataChart control.

markerBrushes.description:
Gets or sets the MarkerBrushes property.
   The marker brushes property defines the palette from which automatically assigned marker brushes are selected.
   The value provided should be an array of css color strings. Optionally the first element can be a string reading "RGB" or "HSV" to specify the interpolation mode of the collection.

markerOutlines.description:
Gets or sets the MarkerOutlines property.
   The marker outlines property defines the palette from which automatically assigned marker outlines are selected.
   The value provided should be an array of css color strings. Optionally the first element can be a string reading "RGB" or "HSV" to specify the interpolation mode of the collection.

outlines.description:
Gets or sets the Outlines property.
   The outlines property defines the palette from which automatically assigned series outlines are selected.
   The value provided should be an array of css color strings. Optionally the first element can be a string reading "RGB" or "HSV" to specify the interpolation mode of the collection.

valueOptions.name: visible
valueOptions.description: The overview pane should be visible.

valueOptions.name: collapsed
valueOptions.description: The overview pane should not be visible.

panModifier.description: Gets or sets the current Chart's PanModifier property.

valueOptions.name: none
valueOptions.description: No modifier key is set.

valueOptions.name: alt
valueOptions.description: The modifier is set to alt key.

valueOptions.name: control
valueOptions.description: The modifier is set to control key.

valueOptions.name: shift
valueOptions.description: The modifier is set to shift key.

pentagonMarkerTemplate.description:
Gets or sets the template to use for pentagon markers on the chart.
   Defines the marker template used for
   series with a marker type of pentagon.
   The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate

pentagramMarkerTemplate.description:
Gets or sets the template to use for pentragram markers on the chart.
   Defines the marker template used for
   series with a marker type of pentagram.
   The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate

plotAreaBackground.description: Gets or sets the brush used as the background for the current Chart object's plot area.

previewRect.description:
Gets or sets the preview rectangle.
   The preview rectangle may be set to Rect.Empty, in which case the visible preview
   strokePath is hidden.
   The provided object should have numeric properties called left, top, width and height.

left.description: Gets sets left position of the rectangle

top.description: Gets sets top position of the rectangle

width.description: Gets sets width position of the rectangle

height.description: Gets sets height position of the rectangle

pyramidMarkerTemplate.description:
Gets or sets the template to use for pyramid markers on the chart.
   Defines the marker template used for
   series with a marker type of pyramid.
   The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate

responseDataKey.description: see $.ig.DataSource. Specifies the name of the property in which data records are held if the response is wrapped.

rightMargin.description: Sets or gets the right margin to use around the chart content in the canvas.

valueOptions.name: area
valueOptions.description: Specify the series as Area series.

valueOptions.name: bar
valueOptions.description: Specify the series as Bar series.

valueOptions.name: column
valueOptions.description: Specify the series as Column series.

valueOptions.name: line
valueOptions.description: Specify the series as Line series.

valueOptions.name: rangeArea
valueOptions.description: Specify the series as Range Area series.

valueOptions.name: rangeColumn
valueOptions.description: Specify the series as Range Column series.

valueOptions.name: splineArea
valueOptions.description: Specify the series as Spline Area series.

valueOptions.name: spline
valueOptions.description: Specify the series as Spline series.

valueOptions.name: stepArea
valueOptions.description: Specify the series as Step Area series

valueOptions.name: stepLine
valueOptions.description: Specify the series as Step Line series.

valueOptions.name: waterfall
valueOptions.description: Specify the series as Waterfall series.

valueOptions.name: financial
valueOptions.description: Specify the series as Financial series.

valueOptions.name: crosshairLayer
valueOptions.description: Specify the series as a crosshair layer.

valueOptions.name: categoryHighlightLayer
valueOptions.description: Specify the series as a category highlight layer.

valueOptions.name: categoryItemHighlightLayer
valueOptions.description: Specify the series as a category item highlight layer.

valueOptions.name: itemToolTipLayer

valueOptions.name: categoryToolTipLayer
valueOptions.description: Specify the series as a category tooltip layer.

name.description: The unique identifier of the series.

dataSource.description: Can be any valid data source accepted by $.ig.DataSource, or an instance of an $.ig.DataSource itself

dataSourceUrl.description: Specifies a remote URL accepted by $.ig.DataSource in order to request data from it

dataSourceType.description: Explicitly set data source type (such as "json"). Please refer to the documentation of $.ig.DataSource and its type property.

responseDataKey.description: Specifies the name of the property in which data records are held if the response is wrapped.

remove.description: Set to true in order to have an existing series removed from the chart, by name

showTooltip.description: Whether the chart should render a tooltip.

tooltipTemplate.description: The name of template or the template itself that chart tooltip will use to render.

legend.description: Can be any valid options accepted by $.ig.ChartLegend, or an instance of an $.ig.ChartLegend itself.

element.description: The name of the element to turn into a legend.

valueOptions.name: item
valueOptions.description: Specify the legend as item legend. It displays a legend item for each pie in the igPieChart control.

valueOptions.name: legend
valueOptions.description: Specify the legend as legend. It is supported by all types of series in the igDataChart control.

legendItemVisibility.description: Gets or sets the legend item visibility for the current series object.

valueOptions.name: visible
valueOptions.description: The legend item should be visible.

valueOptions.name: collapsed
valueOptions.description: The legend item should not be visible.

legendItemBadgeTemplate.description: Gets or sets the LegendItemBadgeTemplate property. The legend item badge is created according to the LegendItemBadgeTemplate on-demand by the series object itself.

legendItemTemplate.description: Gets or sets the LegendItemTemplate property. The legend item control content is created according to the LegendItemTemplate on-demand by the series object itself.

discreteLegendItemTemplate.description: Gets or sets the DiscreteLegendItemTemplate property. The legend item control content is created according to the LegendItemTemplate on-demand by the series object itself.

transitionDuration.description: Gets or sets the duration of the current series's morph.

transitionEasingFunction.description: Provides an easing function to use for the transitions. This should either be a well known name of an easing function (The only currently supported name is cubic), or it should be a function that takes a number and returns the output with the function applied.

resolution.description: Gets or sets the current series object's rendering resolution.

title.description: Gets or sets the Title property. The legend item control is created according to the Title on-demand by the series object itself.

brush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for the series.

outline.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for the outline of the series. Some series types, such as LineSeries, do not display outlines.  Therefore, this property does not affect some charts.

thickness.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for the outline of the series. Some series types, such as LineSeries, do not display outlines.  Therefore, this property does not affect some charts.

coercionMethods.description: Gets or gets the coercion methods to use when loading data from data sources. Should be specified before setting any member paths, if being used. Setting it later will not cause data to be reimported into the chart.

markerType.description: Gets or sets the marker type for the current series object. If the MarkerTemplate property is set, the setting of the MarkerType property will be ignored.

valueOptions.name: unset
valueOptions.description: Marker hasn't been set.

valueOptions.name: none
valueOptions.description: No markerItems.

valueOptions.name: automatic
valueOptions.description: Automatic marker shape.

valueOptions.name: circle
valueOptions.description: Circle marker shape.

valueOptions.name: triangle
valueOptions.description: Flat-top triangle marker shape.

valueOptions.name: pyramid
valueOptions.description: Flat-base triangle marker shape.

valueOptions.name: square
valueOptions.description: Square marker shape.

valueOptions.name: diamond
valueOptions.description: Diamond marker shape.

valueOptions.name: pentagon
valueOptions.description: Pentagon marker shape.

valueOptions.name: hexagon
valueOptions.description: Hexagon marker shape.

valueOptions.name: tetragram
valueOptions.description: Four-pointed star marker shape.

valueOptions.name: pentagram
valueOptions.description: Five-pointed star marker shape.

valueOptions.name: hexagram
valueOptions.description: Six-pointed star marker shape.

markerTemplate.description: Gets or sets the MarkerTemplate for the current series object.

markerBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush that specifies how the current series object's marker interiors are painted.

markerOutline.description: Gets or sets the brush that specifies how the current series object's marker outlines are painted.

xAxis.description: Gets or sets the effective x-axis for the current object.

yAxis.description: Gets or sets the effective y-axis for the current object.

xMemberPath.description: Gets or sets the value mapping property for the current series object.

yMemberPath.description: Gets or sets the value mapping property for the current series object.

trendLineType.description: Gets or sets the trend type for the current scatter series.

valueOptions.name: none
valueOptions.description: No trendline should display.

valueOptions.name: linearFit
valueOptions.description: Linear fit.

valueOptions.name: quadraticFit
valueOptions.description: Quadratic polynomial fit.

valueOptions.name: cubicFit
valueOptions.description: Cubic polynomial fit.

valueOptions.name: quarticFit
valueOptions.description: Quartic polynomial fit.

valueOptions.name: quinticFit
valueOptions.description: Quintic polynomial fit.

valueOptions.name: logarithmicFit
valueOptions.description: Logarithmic fit.

valueOptions.name: exponentialFit
valueOptions.description: Exponential fit.

valueOptions.name: powerLawFit
valueOptions.description: Powerlaw fit.

valueOptions.name: simpleAverage
valueOptions.description: Simple moving average.

valueOptions.name: exponentialAverage
valueOptions.description: Exponential moving average.

valueOptions.name: modifiedAverage
valueOptions.description: Modified moving average.

valueOptions.name: cumulativeAverage
valueOptions.description: Cumulative moving average.

valueOptions.name: weightedAverage
valueOptions.description: Weighted moving average.

trendLineBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use to draw the trend line.

trendLineThickness.description: Gets or sets the thickness of the current scatter series object's trend line.

trendLinePeriod.description: Gets or sets the moving average period for the current scatter series object. The typical, and initial, value for trend line period is 7.

trendLineZIndex.description: Gets or sets the Z-Index of the trend line.  Values greater than 1000 will result in the trend line being rendered in front of the series data.

maximumMarkers.description: Gets or sets the maximum number of markerItems displayed by the current series. If more than the specified number of markerItems are visible, the series will automatically choose a representative set.

unknownValuePlotting.description: Determines how unknown values will be plotted on the chart. Null and Double.NaN are two examples of unknown values.

valueOptions.name: linearInterpolate
valueOptions.description: Plot the unknown value as the midpoint between surrounding known values using linear interpolation.

valueOptions.name: dontPlot
valueOptions.description: Do not plot the unknown value on the chart.

radiusMemberPath.description: Gets or sets the radius mapping property for the current series object.

radiusScale.description: Gets or sets the radius size scale for the bubbles.

labelMemberPath.description: Gets or sets the Label mapping property for the current series object.

fillMemberPath.description: Gets or sets the fill mapping property for the current series object.

fillScale.description: Gets or sets the brush scale for the marker brush.

angleAxis.description: Gets the effective angle axis for the current series object.

valueAxis.description: Gets the effective value axis for the current series object.

clipSeriesToBounds.description: Gets or sets whether to clip the series to the bounds. Setting this to true can effect performance.

valueMemberPath.description: Gets or sets the item path that provides the values for the current series.

radiusX.description: Gets or sets the x-radius of the ellipse that is used to round the corners of the column.

radiusY.description: Gets or sets the y-radius of the ellipse that is used to round the corners of the column.

angleMemberPath.description: Gets or sets the x-radius of the ellipse that is used to round the corners of the column.

radiusAxis.description: Gets the effective radius axis for the current series object.

useCartesianInterpolation.description: Gets or sets whether Cartesian Interpolation should be used rather than Archimedian spiral based interpolation.

negativeBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for negative portions of the series.

splineType.description: Gets or sets the type of spline to be rendered.

valueOptions.name: natural
valueOptions.description: Calculates the spline using a natural spline calculation formula.

valueOptions.name: clamped
valueOptions.description: Calculated the spline using a clamped spline calculation formula.

lowMemberPath.description: Gets or sets the value mapping property for the current series object.

highMemberPath.description: Gets or sets the value mapping property for the current series object.

openMemberPath.description: Gets or sets the open mapping property for the current series object.

closeMemberPath.description: Gets or sets the close mapping property for the current series object.

volumeMemberPath.description: Gets or sets the volume mapping property for the current series object.

displayType.description: Gets or sets the display for the current FinancialIndicator object.

valueOptions.name: candlestick
valueOptions.description: Displays prices as a Japanese Candlestick.

valueOptions.name: OHLC
valueOptions.description: Displays prices as a Japanese Candlestick.

ignoreFirst.description: Gets or sets the number of values to hide at the beginning of the indicator.

period.description: Gets or sets the moving average period for the current AverageDirectionalIndexIndicator object. The typical, and initial, value for AverageDirectionalIndexIndicator periods is 14.

shortPeriod.description: Gets or sets the short moving average period for the current AbsoluteVolumeOscillatorIndicator object. The typical, and initial, value for short AVO periods is 10.

longPeriod.description: Gets or sets the short moving average period for the current AbsoluteVolumeOscillatorIndicator object. The typical, and initial, value for long AVO periods is 30.

valueOptions.name: none
valueOptions.description: No collision avoidance is attempted.

valueOptions.name: omit
valueOptions.description: Markers that collide will be omitted.

valueOptions.name: fade
valueOptions.description: Markers that collide will be faded in opacity.

valueOptions.name: omitAndShift
valueOptions.description: Markers that collide may be shifted or omitted.

valueOptions.name: omitAndFade
valueOptions.description: Markers that collide may be shifted or faded.

useHighMarkerFidelity.description: Sets or Gets whether to increase marker fidelity for extreme data shapes that have lots of Y variation over short X intervals.

useBruteForce.description: Gets or sets the whether to use use brute force mode.

progressiveLoad.description: Gets or sets the whether to progressively load the data into the chart.

mouseOverEnabled.description: Gets or sets the whether the chart reacts to mouse move events.

useSquareCutoffStyle.description: Gets or sets the whether to use squares when halting a render traversal rather than the shape of the coalesced area.

heatMinimum.description: Gets or sets the density value that maps to the minimum heat color.

heatMaximum.description: Gets or sets the value that maps to the maximum heat color.
Gets or sets the value that maps to the maximum heat color.

heatMinimumColor.description: Gets or sets the minimum heat color for the density scale.

heatMaximumColor.description: Gets or sets the maximum heat color for the density scale.

series.description: Gets or sets the series for stacked charts. It should contain array of series objects. Each item in array should represent a series with type="stackedFragment" and it may have most options supported by top-level series object, such as xAxis, yAxis, valueMemberPath, etc.

isDropShadowEnabled.description: Gets or sets whether drop shadow should be enabled for this series.

useSingleShadow.description: Gets or sets whether drop shadow is applied to the whole series visual or to each of the individual shapes forming the series.

shadowColor.description: Gets or sets the color to use for the drop shadow.

shadowBlur.description: Gets or sets the blur amount to use for the drop shadow.

shadowOffsetX.description: Gets or sets the x offset amount to use for the drop shadow.

shadowOffsetY.description: Gets or sets the y offset amount to use for the drop shadow.

isTransitionInEnabled.description: Gets or sets if the series should play a transition in animation when the data source is assigned.
Gets or sets if the series should play a transition in animation when the data source is assigned.

transitionInSpeedType.description: Gets or sets the speed to transition in the series data points.

valueOptions.name: auto
valueOptions.description: A speed type is automatically selected.

valueOptions.name: normal
valueOptions.description: All speeds are normal, data points will arrive at the same time.

valueOptions.name: valueScaled
valueOptions.description: Data points will arrive later if their value is further from the start point.

valueOptions.name: indexScaled
valueOptions.description: Data points will arrive later if their index is further from the axis origin.

valueOptions.name: random
valueOptions.description: Data points will arrive at random times.

transitionInMode.description: Gets or sets the method to transition in the series.

valueOptions.name: auto
valueOptions.description: Series transitions in an automatically chosen way.

valueOptions.name: fromZero
valueOptions.description: Series transitions in from the reference value of the value axis.

valueOptions.name: sweepFromLeft
valueOptions.description: Series sweeps in from the left.

valueOptions.name: sweepFromRight
valueOptions.description: Series sweeps in from the right.

valueOptions.name: sweepFromTop
valueOptions.description: Series sweeps in from the top.

valueOptions.name: sweepFromBottom
valueOptions.description: Series sweeps in from the bottom.

valueOptions.name: sweepFromCenter
valueOptions.description: Series sweeps in from the center.

valueOptions.name: accordionFromLeft
valueOptions.description: Series accordions in from the left.

valueOptions.name: accordionFromRight
valueOptions.description: Series accordions in from the right.

valueOptions.name: accordionFromTop
valueOptions.description: Series accordions in from the top.

valueOptions.name: accordionFromBottom
valueOptions.description: Series accordions in from the bottom.

valueOptions.name: expand
valueOptions.description: Series expands from the value midpoints.

valueOptions.name: sweepFromCategoryAxisMinimum
valueOptions.description: Series sweeps in from the category axis minimum.

valueOptions.name: sweepFromCategoryAxisMaximum
valueOptions.description: Series sweeps in from the category axis maximum.

valueOptions.name: sweepFromValueAxisMinimum
valueOptions.description: Series sweeps in from the value axis minimum.

valueOptions.name: sweepFromValueAxisMaximum
valueOptions.description: Series sweeps in from the value axis maximum.

valueOptions.name: accordionFromCategoryAxisMinimum
valueOptions.description: Series accordions in from the category axis minimum.

valueOptions.name: accordionFromCategoryAxisMaximum
valueOptions.description: Series accordions in from the category axis maximum.

valueOptions.name: accordionFromValueAxisMinimum
valueOptions.description: Series accordions in from the value axis minimum.

valueOptions.name: accordionFromValueAxisMaximum
valueOptions.description: Series accordions in from the value axis maximum.

transitionInDuration.description: Gets or sets the duration of the current series's transition in morph in milliseconds.

radius.description: Gets or sets the corner radius to use for the series, if applicable.

areaFillOpacity.description: Gets or sets the opacity modifier to apply to the area fill shape of the series, if applicable.

expectFunctions.description: Gets or sets whether the series should expect that its data source members need to be called as functions to get their values.

useInterpolation.description: Gets or sets whether the hover layer should use interpolation to position itself relative the closest values.

skipUnknowns.description: Gets or sets whether the hover layer should skip unknown values when trying to find the closest values.
Gets or sets whether the hover layer should skip unknown values when trying to find the closest values.

verticalLineVisibility.description: Gets or sets whether the vertical crosshair portion of the layer should be visible.

horizontalLineVisibility.description: Gets or sets whether the horizontal crosshair portion of the layer should be visible.

targetSeries.description: Gets or sets the name of the target series for the layer, if desired. Setting the target series will scope the layer to target just that series.

targetAxis.description: Gets or sets the name of the target axis for the layer, if desired. Setting the target axis will scope the layer to target just that axis.

isCustomCategoryStyleAllowed.description: Gets or sets whether a custom category style is allowed. Setting this to true will case the assigningCategoryStyle event to get fired, if provided.

isCustomCategoryMarkerStyleAllowed.description: Gets or sets whether a custom category marker style is allowed. Setting this to true will case the assigningCategoryMarkerStyle event to get fired, if provided.

isHighlightingEnabled.description: Gets or sets whether highlighting should be enabled for the series, if supported.

bandHighlightWidth.description: Gets or sets the width to use for the highlight region if highlighting items in a grid aligned series (line, spline, etc), with a banded shape.

highlightType.description: Gets or sets which type of highlight shape to use when highlighting items.

valueOptions.name: auto
valueOptions.description: Use an automatic highlight type for this series.

valueOptions.name: marker
valueOptions.description: Use a marker highlight type for this series.

valueOptions.name: shape
valueOptions.description: Use a shape highlight type for this series.

highlightType.description: Gets or sets the Position to apply to the tooltip containers.

valueOptions.name: auto
valueOptions.description: Use an automatic position for the category tooltips.

valueOptions.name: outsideStart
valueOptions.description: Position the category tooltip at the outside start of the value axis.

valueOptions.name: insideStart
valueOptions.description: Position the category tooltip at the inside start of the value axis.

valueOptions.name: insideEnd
valueOptions.description: Position the category tooltip at the inside end of the value axis.

valueOptions.name: outsideEnd
valueOptions.description: Position the category tooltip at the outside end of the value axis.

cursorPosition.description: Sets the position a cursor position to use instead of the current mouse cursor position for displaying the annotations in this layer. Should be an object with an x and a y property in world coordinates (ranging from 0 to 1)

isDefaultCrosshairDisabled.description: Sets if the presence of this layer should disable the default crosshair behavior of the chart, if present.

useIndex.description: Sets if the current layer should take up a brush/ordering index in the series collection to derive its color automatically.

useLegend.description: Sets if the current layer should have an entry in the legend of the chart. By default annotation layers are not present in the legend.

size.description: To set both dimensions of the chart simultaneously an object with a width and height property can be provided

width.description: Defines the width dimension of the chart

height.description: Defines the height dimension of the chart

squareMarkerTemplate.description:
Gets or sets the template to use for square markers on the chart.
   Defines the marker template used for
   series with a marker type of square.
   The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate

subtitle.description: the subtitle to display for the component.

subtitleBottomMargin.description: the bottom margin to use for the subtitle.

subtitleHorizontalAlignment.description: The horizontal alignment to use for the subtitle.

valueOptions.name: left
valueOptions.description: Left aligns the subtitle.

valueOptions.name: center
valueOptions.description: Center aligns the subtitle.

valueOptions.name: right
valueOptions.description: Right aligns the subtitle.

subtitleLeftMargin.description: the left margin to use for the subtitle.

subtitleRightMargin.description: the right margin to use for the subtitle.

subtitleTextColor.description: the color to use for the subtitle.

subtitleTextStyle.description: the css font property to use for the title.

subtitleTopMargin.description: the top margin to use for the subtitle.

syncChannel.description: The channel name to use to sync this chart with other charts.

synchronizeVertically.description: Whether the chart should be synchronized vertically

syncrhonizeHorizontally.description: Whether the chart should be synchronized horizontally

tetragramMarkerTemplate.description:
Gets or sets the template to use for tetragram markers on the chart.
   Defines the marker template used for
   series with a marker type of tetragram.
   The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate

theme.description: The swatch used to style this widget

title.description: the title to display for the component.

titleBottomMargin.description: the bottom margin to use for the title.

titleHorizontalAlignment.description: The horizontal alignment to use for the title.

valueOptions.name: left
valueOptions.description: Left aligns the title.

valueOptions.name: center
valueOptions.description: Center aligns the title.

valueOptions.name: right
valueOptions.description: Right aligns the title.

titleLeftMargin.description: the left margin to use for the title.

titleRightMargin.description: the right margin to use for the title.

titleTextColor.description: the color to use for the title.

titleTextStyle.description: the css font property to use for the title.

titleTopMargin.description: the top margin to use for the title.

topMargin.description: Sets or gets the top margin to use around the chart content in the canvas.

triangleMarkerTemplate.description:
Gets or sets the template to use for triangle markers on the chart.
   Defines the marker template used for
   series with a marker type of triangle.
   The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate

verticalZoomable.description: Gets or sets the current Chart's vertical zoomability.

width.description: The width of the chart. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).

windowPositionHorizontal.description:
A number between 0 and 1 determining the position of the horizontal scroll.
   This property is effectively a shortcut to the X position of the WindowRect property.

windowPositionVertical.description:
A number between 0 and 1 determining the position of the vertical scroll.
   This property is effectively a shortcut to the Y position of the WindowRect property.

windowRect.description:
A rectangle representing the portion of the chart currently in view.
   A rectangle at X=0, Y=0 with a Height and Width of 1 implies the entire plotting area is in view. A Height and Width of .5 would imply that the view is halfway zoomed in.
   The provided object should have numeric properties called left, top, width and height.

left.description: Gets sets left position of the rectangle

top.description: Gets sets top position of the rectangle

width.description: Gets sets width position of the rectangle

height.description: Gets sets height position of the rectangle

windowRectMinWidth.description:
Sets or gets the minimum width that the window rect is allowed to reach before being clamped.
   Decrease this value if you want to allow for further zooming into the viewer.
   If this value is lowered too much it can cause graphical corruption due to floating point arithmetic inaccuracy.

windowResponse.description: Set or get the upating method of the view on a user action

valueOptions.name: deferred
valueOptions.description: Defer the view update until after the user action is complete.

valueOptions.name: immediate
valueOptions.description: Update the view immediately while the user action is happening.

windowScaleHorizontal.description:
A number between 0 and 1 determining the scale of the horizontal zoom.
   This property is effectively a shortcut to the Width of the WindowRect property.

windowScaleVertical.description:
A number between 0 and 1 determining the scale of the vertical zoom.
   This property is effectively a shortcut to the Height of the WindowRect property.
